Name: Anabel
description:
Anabel studied until second grade. Her life partner makes a living in agriculture and they have two children who do not yet attend school.

Anabel makes a living with domestic tasks, raising pigs and chickens, and making bedrolls. Through her work, she is able to support the costs of their home.

The funding will be used to buy pigs and chickens to raise them and later sell.

Her dreams are to have everything she needs in her house and to support her children so that they can one day be professionals.
